entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
